# Core dependencies (minimal)
version-get>=0.1.0

# Optional dependencies for full format support
pyyaml>=6.0.1              # YAML support
tomli>=2.0.1;python_version<"3.11"   # TOML read support (Python < 3.11)
tomli-w>=1.0.0             # TOML write support
json5>=0.9.14              # JSON5 support (flexible JSON)

# Optional rich logging
richcolorlog>=0.1.0        # Rich colored logging (optional)
